Property.name: Login
Property.value: select t1.id_user, t3.id_organization, t2.FIRST_NAME, t2.LAST_NAME, t1.username, t2.VAT_NO, t3.id_group, t4.name, t5.org_type, t2.short_name, t2.phone_no, t2.fax, t2.email from sm.sm_users t1 left join sm.sm_subjects t2 on (t1.id_subject = t2.id_subject) left join sm.sm_org_usr_groups t3 on (t1.id_user = t3.id_user and t3.activity = 1) left join sm.sm_org_type_groups t5 on (t3.id_org_type_group = t5.id_org_type_group) left join sm.sm_groups t4 on (t3.id_group = t4.id_group and t4.activity = 1) where (t1.username = ? or t1.username = ?) and t1.password = ? and t1.activity = 1 and t3.id_group in (34, 1044, 1200,1226,1227,1228,1012)

Property.name: isLoginObjekt
Property.value: select id_establishment from vis_ex.objekt_korisnik t1 where t1.id_user = ? and activity = 1

Property.name: CheckIfTiskara
Property.value: select t1.type, t2.id_group, t3.name from sm.sm_organizations t1 left join sm.sm_org_groups t2 on (t1.id_organization = t2.id_organization and t2.activity = 1) left join sm.sm_groups t3 on (t2.id_group = t3.id_group and t3.activity = 1) where t1.id_organization = ? and t1.activity = 1 and t1.type = 'PRINT'

Property.name: CheckOrganizacija
Property.value: select 1228 as id_group from vis_ex.gn_docs_org o where id_organization = ? and exists (select * from sm.sm_organizations where id_organization = o.id_organization and activity = 1) and rownum = 1 union all select 1200 as id_group from vis_ex.cert_org o where id_organization = ? and exists (select * from sm.sm_organizations where id_organization = o.id_organization and activity = 1) and rownum = 1

Property.name: ZaposleniciVetOrg
Property.value: select t1.id_user,t1.id_organization, t3.first_name, t3.last_name, t3.vat_no, t3.phone_no, t3.email, t3.mobile_phone_no, t3.fax, t3.sex, t3.d_update,t3.l_valid_to from sm.smv_veterinarians t1 left join sm.sm_users t2 on (t1.id_user = t2.id_user) left join sm.sm_subjects t3 on (t2.id_subject=t3.id_subject)

Property.name: SelectVetOrg
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.ID_ORGANIZATION, t1.TYPE, t1.NAME1, t1.ADDRESS1, t1.ADDRESS2, t1.TEL, t1.FAX, t1.EMAIL, t1.D_INSERT, t1.ID_SUBJECT, t1.ID_ORG_SUPERIOR, t2.vat_no from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t1 left join sm.sm_subjects t2 on (t1.id_subject = t2.id_subject) where t1.vet_org=1 and t1.activity=1 and t2.activity=1 order by t1.ID_ORGANIZATION ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountVetOrg
Property.value: select count(*) from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t1 where t1.vet_org=1 and t1.activity=1 order by t1.ID_ORGANIZATION

Property.name: SearchVetOrg
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.ID_ORGANIZATION, t1.TYPE, t1.NAME1, t1.ADDRESS1, t1.ADDRESS2, t1.TEL, t1.FAX, t1.EMAIL, t1.D_INSERT, t1.ID_SUBJECT, t1.ID_ORG_SUPERIOR, t2.vat_no from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t1 left join sm.sm_subjects t2 on (t1.id_subject = t2.id_subject) where (t1.vet_org=1 or t1.ID_ORGANIZATION = 204) and upper(t1.name1) like ? and (upper(t1.ADDRESS1) like ? or upper(t1.ADDRESS2) like ?) and t1.activity=1 and t2.activity=1 order by t1.ID_ORGANIZATION ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountSearchVetOrg
Property.value: select count(*) from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t1 where (t1.vet_org=1 or t1.ID_ORGANIZATION = 204) and upper(t1.name1) like ? and (upper(t1.ADDRESS1) like ? or upper(t1.ADDRESS2) like ?) and activity=1 order by ID_ORGANIZATION

Property.name: SearchVetOrg2
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.ID_ORGANIZATION, t1.TYPE, t1.NAME1, t1.ADDRESS1, t1.ADDRESS2, t1.TEL, t1.FAX, t1.EMAIL, t1.D_INSERT, t1.ID_SUBJECT, t1.ID_ORG_SUPERIOR, t2.vat_no from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t1 left join sm.sm_subjects t2 on (t1.id_subject = t2.id_subject) where (t1.vet_org=1 or t1.ID_ORGANIZATION = 204) and t1.ID_ORGANIZATION = nvl(?,t1.ID_ORGANIZATION) and upper(t1.name1) like ? and upper(t1.ADDRESS1) like ? and upper(t1.ADDRESS2) like ? and t2.vat_no like ? and t1.activity=1 and t2.activity=1 order by t1.ID_ORGANIZATION ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: GetMultiplikator
Property.value: select multiply from vis_ex.gn_docs where name = 'BARKOD-151046'

Property.name: CountSearchVetOrg2
Property.value: select count(*) from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t1 left join sm.sm_subjects t2 on (t1.id_subject = t2.id_subject) where (t1.vet_org=1 or t1.ID_ORGANIZATION = 204) and t1.ID_ORGANIZATION = nvl(?,t1.ID_ORGANIZATION) and upper(t1.name1) like ? and upper(t1.ADDRESS1) like ? and upper(t1.ADDRESS2) like ? and t2.vat_no like ? and t1.activity=1 and t2.activity=1

Property.name: SelectTiskare
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.ID_ORGANIZATION, t1.TYPE, t1.NAME1, t1.ADDRESS1, t1.ADDRESS2, t1.TEL, t1.FAX, t1.EMAIL, t1.D_INSERT, t1.ID_SUBJECT, t1.ID_ORG_SUPERIOR, t2.vat_no from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t1 left join sm.sm_subjects t2 on (t1.id_subject = t2.id_subject) where t1.type = 'PRINT' and t1.activity=1 and t2.activity=1 order by t1.ID_ORGANIZATION ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountTiskare
Property.value: select count(*) from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS where type = 'PRINT' and activity=1

Property.name: SearchTiskare
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.ID_ORGANIZATION, t1.TYPE, t1.NAME1, t1.ADDRESS1, t1.ADDRESS2, t1.TEL, t1.FAX, t1.EMAIL, t1.D_INSERT, t1.ID_SUBJECT, t1.ID_ORG_SUPERIOR, t2.vat_no from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t1 left join sm.sm_subjects t2 on (t1.id_subject = t2.id_subject) where t1.type = 'PRINT' and upper(t1.name1) like ? and (upper(t1.ADDRESS1) like ? or upper(t1.ADDRESS2) like ?) and t1.activity=1 and t2.activity=1 order by t1.ID_ORGANIZATION ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountSearchTiskare
Property.value: select count(*) from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t1 where t1.type = 'PRINT' and upper(t1.name1) like ? and (upper(t1.ADDRESS1) like ? or upper(t1.ADDRESS2) like ?) and t1.activity=1

Property.name: SearchTiskare2
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.ID_ORGANIZATION, t1.TYPE, t1.NAME1, t1.ADDRESS1, t1.ADDRESS2, t1.TEL, t1.FAX, t1.EMAIL, t1.D_INSERT, t1.ID_SUBJECT, t1.ID_ORG_SUPERIOR, t2.vat_no from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t1 left join sm.sm_subjects t2 on (t1.id_subject = t2.id_subject) where t1.type='PRINT' and t1.ID_ORGANIZATION = nvl(?,t1.ID_ORGANIZATION) and upper(t1.name1) like ? and upper(t1.ADDRESS1) like ? and upper(t1.ADDRESS2) like ? and t2.vat_no like ? and t1.activity=1 and t2.activity=1 order by t1.ID_ORGANIZATION ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountSearchTiskare2
Property.value: select count(*) from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t1 left join sm.sm_subjects t2 on (t1.id_subject = t2.id_subject) where t1.type='PRINT' and t1.ID_ORGANIZATION = nvl(?,t1.ID_ORGANIZATION) and upper(t1.name1) like ? and upper(t1.ADDRESS1) like ? and upper(t1.ADDRESS2) like ? and t2.vat_no like ? and t1.activity=1 and t2.activity=1

Property.name: SelectDokumentiTiskare
Property.value: select t1.id_gn_docs_org, t2.name, t2.notes, t2.id_state, t5.code, t5.text, t2.id_measure_unit, t3.naziv, t2.id_language, t4.name, t4.java_code, t2.price, t2.ID_GN_ORG_DOCS from vis_ex.gn_docs_org t1 left join vis_ex.gn_docs t2 on (t1.id_document = t2.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t3 on (t2.id_measure_unit = t3.id) left join sm.sm_languages t4 on (t2.id_language = t4.id_language) left join sm.sm_states t5 on (t2.id_state = t5.id) where t1.id_organization = ?

Property.name: SelectDokumentiVetOrg
Property.value: select t1.id_gn_docs_org, t2.name, t2.notes, t2.id_state, t5.code, t5.text, t2.id_measure_unit, t3.naziv, t2.id_language, t4.name, t4.java_code, t2.price, t2.ID_GN_ORG_DOCS from vis_ex.gn_docs_org t1 left join vis_ex.gn_docs t2 on (t1.id_document = t2.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t3 on (t2.id_measure_unit = t3.id) left join sm.sm_languages t4 on (t2.id_language = t4.id_language) left join sm.sm_states t5 on (t2.id_state = t5.id) where t1.id_organization = ?

Property.name: SelectDokumentiObjekt
Property.value: select t1.id_gn_docs_est, t2.name, t2.notes, t2.id_state, t5.code, t5.text, t2.id_measure_unit, t3.naziv, t2.id_language, t4.name, t4.java_code, t2.price, t2.ID_GN_ORG_DOCS from vis_ex.gn_docs_est t1 left join vis_ex.gn_docs t2 on (t1.id_document = t2.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t3 on (t2.id_measure_unit = t3.id) left join sm.sm_languages t4 on (t2.id_language = t4.id_language) left join sm.sm_states t5 on (t2.id_state = t5.id) where t1.id_establishment = ?

Property.name: SelectCertifikatiVetOrg
Property.value: select t1.id_cert_org, t1.id_certificate, t2.code, t2.id_measure, t3.name, t2.text, t5.id, t5.code, t5.text, t2.price from vis_ex.cert_org t1 left join vis_ex.cert_certificates t2 on (t1.id_certificate= t2.id) left join vis_ex.cert_measure t3 on (t2.id_measure = t3.id_measure) left join sm.sm_states t5 on (t2.sm_states_id = t5.id) where t1.id_organization = ?

Property.name: SelectDokumenti
Property.value: select ID_GN_ORG_DOCS, NAME from vis_ex.gn_docs where activity = 1

Property.name: SelectCertifikati
Property.value: select ID, CODE from vis_ex.CERT_CERTIFICATES

Property.name: GetSequenceDocOrg
Property.value: select VIS_EX.GN_DOCS_ORG_SEQ.nextval from dual

Property.name: GetSequenceDocEst
Property.value: select VIS_EX.GN_DOCS_EST_SEQ.nextval from dual

Property.name: GetSequenceCertOrg
Property.value: select VIS_EX.CERT_ORG_SEQ.nextval from dual

Property.name: InsertDocOrg
Property.value: INSERT INTO vis_ex.gn_docs_org(ID_GN_DOCS_ORG, ID_ORGANIZATION, ID_DOCUMENT) VALUES(?,?,?)

Property.name: InsertDocEst
Property.value: INSERT INTO vis_ex.gn_docs_est(ID_GN_DOCS_EST, ID_ESTABLISHMENT, ID_DOCUMENT) VALUES(?,?,?)

Property.name: InsertCertOrg
Property.value: INSERT INTO vis_ex.cert_org(ID_CERT_ORG, ID_CERTIFICATE, ID_ORGANIZATION) VALUES(?,?,?)

Property.name: DeleteDocOrg
Property.value: DELETE FROM vis_ex.gn_docs_org WHERE ID_GN_DOCS_ORG = ?

Property.name: DeleteDocEst
Property.value: DELETE FROM vis_ex.gn_docs_est WHERE ID_GN_DOCS_EST = ?

Property.name: DeleteCertOrg
Property.value: DELETE FROM vis_ex.cert_org WHERE ID_CERT_ORG = ?

Property.name: DokumentiSifrarnik
Property.value: select ID_GN_ORG_DOCS, NAME, NOTES, ID_MEASURE_UNIT, t2.NAZIV, PRICE, t1.activity from vis_ex.gn_docs t1 left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t2 on (t1.id_measure_unit = t2.id) where t1.activity = 1 and t2.activity= 1 order by ID_GN_ORG_DOCS

Property.name: SearchDokumentiSifrarnik
Property.value: select t1.ID_GN_ORG_DOCS, t1.NAME, t1.NOTES, t1.ID_MEASURE_UNIT, t2.NAZIV, t1.PRICE, t1.activity from vis_ex.gn_docs t1 left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t2 on (t1.id_measure_unit = t2.id) where t1.activity=? and t2.activity= 1 and upper(t1.NAME) like ? and upper(t1.NOTES) like ? and upper(t2.NAZIV) like ? order by t1.ID_GN_ORG_DOCS

Property.name: SelectMjera
Property.value: select * from vis_ex.gn_measure_unit where ACTIVITY = 1 order by 1

Property.name: GetSequenceDocSif
Property.value: select VIS_EX.GN_DOCS_SEQ.nextval from dual

Property.name: InsertDocSif
Property.value: INSERT INTO vis_ex.gn_docs(ID_GN_ORG_DOCS, NAME, NOTES, ID_MEASURE_UNIT, PRICE, ACTIVITY) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?)

Property.name: EditDocSif
Property.value: UPDATE vis_ex.gn_docs SET NAME=?, NOTES=?, ID_MEASURE_UNIT=?, PRICE=?, activity=? WHERE ID_GN_ORG_DOCS=?

Property.name: DeleteDoc
Property.value: UPDATE vis_ex.gn_docs SET ACTIVITY=0 WHERE ID_GN_ORG_DOCS=?

Property.name: DeleteCert
Property.value: UPDATE vis_ex.cert_certificates SET ACTIVITY=0, D_UPDATE = sysdate, VALID_TO = sysdate, ID_UPDATER = ? WHERE ID = ?

Property.name: SearchMjera
Property.value: select * from vis_ex.gn_measure_unit where ACTIVITY = 1 and UPPER(naziv) like UPPER(CONCAT(?,'%')) order by 1

Property.name: GetSequenceUnitSif
Property.value: select VIS_EX.GN_MEASURE_UNIT_SEQ.nextval from dual

Property.name: DeleteUnit
Property.value: UPDATE vis_ex.gn_measure_unit SET ACTIVITY=0 WHERE ID = ?

Property.name: EditUnitSif
Property.value: UPDATE vis_ex.gn_measure_unit SET NAZIV=? WHERE ID = ?

Property.name: InsertUnitSif
Property.value: INSERT INTO vis_ex.gn_measure_unit(ID, NAZIV, ACTIVITY) VALUES(?,?,1)

Property.name: Org4Doc
Property.value: select t1.id_organization, t2.name1 as name, t3.price from vis_ex.gn_docs_org t1 left join SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t2 on (t1.id_organization = t2.id_organization) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_document = t3.id_gn_org_docs) where t2.type = 'PRINT' and t1.id_document = ?

Property.name: DokumentiNarudzba
Property.value: select ID_GN_ORG_DOCS, NAME, NOTES, ID_MEASURE_UNIT, t2.NAZIV, PRICE, MULTIPLY, PREFIX, SERIAL_NO, CUR_SERIAL_NO from vis_ex.gn_docs t1 left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t2 on (t1.id_measure_unit = t2.id) where t1.ACTIVITY = 1 and t1.id_gn_org_docs in (select id_document from vis_ex.gn_docs_org where id_organization = ?)

Property.name: DokumentiNarudzbaHistory
Property.value: select ID_GN_ORG_DOCS, NAME, NOTES, ID_MEASURE_UNIT, t2.NAZIV, PRICE, MULTIPLY, PREFIX, SERIAL_NO, CUR_SERIAL_NO, PAKIRANJE_KOM, nvl(MAX_NO,-1) as max_no from vis_ex.gn_docs t1 left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t2 on (t1.id_measure_unit = t2.id) where t1.id_gn_org_docs in (select id_document from vis_ex.gn_docs_org where id_organization = ?) and t1.activity=1

Property.name: DokumentiNarudzbaObjekt
Property.value: select ID_GN_ORG_DOCS, NAME, NOTES, ID_MEASURE_UNIT, t2.NAZIV, PRICE, MULTIPLY, PREFIX, SERIAL_NO, CUR_SERIAL_NO from vis_ex.gn_docs t1 left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t2 on (t1.id_measure_unit = t2.id) where t1.ACTIVITY = 1 and t1.id_gn_org_docs in (select id_document from vis_ex.gn_docs_est where id_establishment = ?)

Property.name: DokumentiNarudzbaObjektHistory
Property.value: select ID_GN_ORG_DOCS, NAME, NOTES, ID_MEASURE_UNIT, t2.NAZIV, PRICE, MULTIPLY, PREFIX, SERIAL_NO, CUR_SERIAL_NO, PAKIRANJE_KOM, nvl(MAX_NO,-1) as max_no from vis_ex.gn_docs t1 left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t2 on (t1.id_measure_unit = t2.id) where t1.id_gn_org_docs in (select id_document from vis_ex.gn_docs_est where id_establishment = ?) and t1.activity=1

Property.name: SelectNarucitelj
Property.value: select t1.ID_ORGANIZATION, t1.TYPE, t1.NAME1, t1.ADDRESS1, t1.ADDRESS2, t1.TEL, t1.FAX, t1.EMAIL, t1.D_INSERT, t1.ID_SUBJECT, t1.ID_ORG_SUPERIOR, t2.VAT_NO from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS t1 left join sm.sm_subjects t2 on (t1.id_subject = t2.id_subject) where ID_ORGANIZATION = ?

Property.name: GetSequenceOrder
Property.value: select VIS_EX.GN_ITEM_ORDERS_SEQ.nextval from dual

Property.name: GetSequenceOrderItem
Property.value: select VIS_EX.GN_ITEM_ORDERS_TYPE_SEQ.nextval from dual

Property.name: InsertOrder
Property.value: INSERT INTO VIS_EX.GN_ITEM_ORDERS (ID_ORDER, ITEMS_NO, D_ORDER, ID_STATUS, D_INSERT, ID_INSERTER, ACTIVITY, ID_SESSION, UKUPNO_IZNOS, NARUCIO, ID_NARUCITELJ, NARUCITELJ_TIP, NOTES) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

Property.name: InsertOrderItem
Property.value: INSERT INTO VIS_EX.GN_ITEM_ORDERS_TYPE(ID_GN_ITEM_ORDERS_TYPE, ID_GN_ITEM_ORDER, ID_GN_ORG_DOCS, KOLICINA, IZNOS, CIJENA, ID_DOBAVLJAC, SERIJSKI_BROJ_OD, SERIJSKI_BROJ_DO, ID_STATUS) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,1)

Property.name: InsertOrderItemTestSP
Property.value: {call vis_ex.doc_Order_Serial(?,?,?)}

Property.name: SelectAssignOrder
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv as status, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t6.name1, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price, t2.narucitelj_tip, t2.id_order from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_organization) where id_dobavljac = ? and t1.id_status = 1 and t2.narucitelj_tip = 1 union all select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv as status, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t7.name, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price, t2.narucitelj_tip, t2.id_order from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join vis.est_establishments t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_establishment) left join vis.est_documents t7 on (t6.id_document = t7.id_document) where id_dobavljac = ? and t1.id_status = 1 and t2.narucitelj_tip = 2 ) a where rownum < ? order by a.id_order desc ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountAssignOrder
Property.value: select count(*) from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) where id_dobavljac = ? and t1.id_status = 1

Property.name: SelectReuseOrder
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv as status, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t6.name1, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price, t2.narucitelj_tip, t2.id_order from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_organization) where id_dobavljac = ? and t1.id_status in (10,9) and t2.narucitelj_tip = 1 and not exists (select 'x' from vis_ex.gn_docs_reuse_serial where id_gn_item_orders_type = t1.id_gn_item_orders_type) union all select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv as status, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t7.name, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price, t2.narucitelj_tip, t2.id_order from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join vis.est_establishments t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_establishment) left join vis.est_documents t7 on (t6.id_document = t7.id_document) where id_dobavljac = ? and t1.id_status in (10,9) and t2.narucitelj_tip = 2 and not exists (select 'x' from vis_ex.gn_docs_reuse_serial where id_gn_item_orders_type = t1.id_gn_item_orders_type) ) a where rownum < ? order by a.id_order desc ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountReuseOrder

Property.value: select count(*) from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) where t1.id_status = 3 and t2.narucitelj_tip = 1 and id_dobavljac=? and t1.id_gn_item_order like nvl(?,'%') and t1.id_gn_org_docs like nvl(?, '%') and t2.id_narucitelj like nvl(?, '%') and t2.d_order between to_date(?,'dd.MM.yyyy') and to_date(?,'dd.MM.yyyy')

Property.name: SearchDeliveryOrderType2
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv as status, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t7.name as name1, t1.id_status as status1, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price, t2.narucitelj_tip, t2.id_order from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join vis.est_establishments t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_establishment) left join vis.est_documents t7 on (t6.id_document = t7.id_document) where t1.id_status = 3 and t2.narucitelj_tip = 2 and id_dobavljac=? and t1.id_gn_item_order like nvl(?,'%') and t1.id_gn_org_docs like nvl(?, '%') and t2.id_narucitelj like nvl(?, '%') and t2.d_order between to_date(?,'dd.MM.yyyy') and to_date(?,'dd.MM.yyyy') ) a where rownum < ? order by a.id_order desc ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountSearchDeliveryOrderType2
Property.value: select count(*) from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) where t1.id_status = 3 and t2.narucitelj_tip = 2 and id_dobavljac=? and t1.id_gn_item_order like nvl(?,'%') and t1.id_gn_org_docs like nvl(?, '%') and t2.id_narucitelj like nvl(?, '%') and t2.d_order between to_date(?,'dd.MM.yyyy') and to_date(?,'dd.MM.yyyy')

Property.name: EditAssignOrder
Property.value: select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t6.name1, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_organization) where t1.id_status = 1 and t1.id_dobavljac=? and t1.id_gn_item_order=? order by t2.id_order desc

Property.name: EditDeliveryOrder
Property.value: select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t6.name1, t3.price from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_organization) where t1.id_status = 3 and t1.id_dobavljac=? and t1.id_gn_item_order=? order by t2.id_order desc

Property.name: SelectNarucitelj2
Property.value: select t1.id_narucitelj, t2.name1, t2.address1, t2.address2, t2.tel, t2.fax, t2.email, t3.short_name, t3.vat_no, t3.fax, t3.email, t3.phone_no from vis_ex.gn_item_orders t1 left join sm.sm_organizations t2 on (t1.id_narucitelj = t2.id_organization) left join sm.sm_subjects t3 on (t2.id_subject = t3.id_subject) left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t4 on (t1.id_order = t4.id_gn_item_order) where rownum = 1 and t4.id_dobavljac = ?

Property.name: SelectNaruciteljOrg
Property.value: select t1.id_organization, t1.name1, t1.address1, t1.address2, t1.tel, t1.fax, t1.email, t2.short_name, t2.vat_no, t2.fax, t2.email, t2.phone_no from sm.sm_organizations t1 left join sm.sm_subjects t2 on (t1.id_subject = t2.id_subject) where t1.id_organization = ?

Property.name: SelectNaruciteljObjekt
Property.value: select t1.id_establishment, t2.name, concat(t4.street, concat(' ', t4.hn)) as address1, concat(t5.code, concat(' ', t5.name)) as address2, t2.phone_no as tel, t2.fax, t2.email, t3.short_name, t3.vat_no, t3.fax, t3.email, t3.phone_no from vis.est_establishments t1 left join vis.est_documents t2 on (t1.id_document = t2.id_document) left join sm.sm_subjects t3 on (t2.id_subject = t3.id_subject) left join loc.loc_addresses t4 on (t2.id_address = t4.id_address) left join loc.loc_zip_codes t5 on (t4.id_zip_code = t5.id_zip_code) where t1.id_establishment = ?

Property.name: GetPersonData
Property.value: select distinct t3.id_user, t3.name from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join sm.sm_users t3 on (t2.narucio = t3.id_user) where t1.id_gn_item_order = ?

Property.name: AssignOrderItem
Property.value: update vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type set id_status = 3 where id_gn_item_orders_type = ?

Property.name: CheckOrderStatus
Property.value: select id_status from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type where id_gn_item_order = ?

Property.name: UpdateOrderStatus
Property.value: update vis_ex.gn_item_orders set id_status = ? where id_order = ?

Property.name: ChangeStatusItem
Property.value: update vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type set id_status = ? where id_gn_item_orders_type = ?

Property.name: OrderReceptionOrg
Property.value: select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t6.name1, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price, t2.narucitelj_tip, t2.id_order from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_organization) where t1.id_status = 5 and t2.id_narucitelj=? and t2.narucitelj_tip = 1 order by t2.id_order desc

Property.name: OrderReceptionObjekt
Property.value: select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t7.name, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price, t2.narucitelj_tip, t2.id_order from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join vis.est_establishments t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_establishment) left join vis.est_documents t7 on (t6.id_document = t7.id_document) where t1.id_status = 5 and t2.id_narucitelj=? and t2.narucitelj_tip = 2 order by t2.id_order desc

Property.name: CheckOrderReceptionExists
Property.value: select count(*) from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_organization) where t1.id_status = 5 and t2.id_narucitelj=? order by t2.id_order desc

Property.name: GetSequenceReceivedItem
Property.value: select VIS_EX.GN_ITEM_ORDERS_RECEIVED_SEQ.nextval from dual

Property.name: InsertReceivedItem
Property.value: INSERT INTO VIS_EX.GN_ITEM_ORDERS_RECEIVED(ID_GN_ITEM_ORDERS_RECEIVED, ID_GN_ITEM_ORDERS_TYPE, ID_GN_ITEM_ORDER, ID_GN_ORG_DOCS, KOLICINA, SERIJSKI_BROJ_OD, SERIJSKI_BROJ_DO, DATE_RECEIVED) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

Property.name: GetSequenceReturnItem
Property.value: select VIS_EX.GN_ITEM_ORDERS_RECEIVED_SEQ.nextval from dual

Property.name: InsertReturnItem
Property.value: INSERT INTO VIS_EX.GN_ITEM_ORDERS_RETURNED(ID_GN_ITEM_ORDERS_RETURNED, ID_GN_ITEM_ORDERS_TYPE, ID_GN_ITEM_ORDER, ID_GN_ORG_DOCS, KOLICINA, SERIJSKI_BROJ_OD, SERIJSKI_BROJ_DO, DATE_RECEIVED, NOTES) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

Property.name: OrderReturnOrg
Property.value: select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t6.name1, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_organization) where t1.id_status = 5 and t2.id_narucitelj=? and t2.narucitelj_tip = 1 order by t2.id_order desc

Property.name: OrderReturnObjekt
Property.value: select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t7.name, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join vis.est_establishments t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_establishment) left join vis.est_documents t7 on (t6.id_document = t7.id_document) where t1.id_status = 5 and t2.id_narucitelj=? and t2.narucitelj_tip = 2 order by t2.id_order desc

Property.name: OrderReturnConfirm
Property.value: select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t6.name1, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price, t2.id_order from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_organization) where t1.id_status = 8 and t2.narucitelj_tip = 1 and id_dobavljac=? union all select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t7.name as name1, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price, t2.id_order from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join vis.est_establishments t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_establishment) left join vis.est_documents t7 on (t6.id_document = t7.id_document) where t1.id_status = 8 and t2.narucitelj_tip = 2 and id_dobavljac=? order by id_order desc

Property.name: SelectStatuses
Property.value: select ID, NAZIV from vis_ex.gn_item_order_status where activity = 1 order by 1

Property.name: SelectAllDokumenti
Property.value: select ID_GN_ORG_DOCS, NAME, NOTES, ID_MEASURE_UNIT, t2.NAZIV, PRICE from vis_ex.gn_docs t1 left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t2 on (t1.id_measure_unit = t2.id) where t1.ACTIVITY = 1

Property.name: SelectAllNarucitelj
Property.value: select ID_ORGANIZATION, TYPE, NAME1, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, TEL, FAX, EMAIL, D_INSERT, ID_SUBJECT, ID_ORG_SUPERIOR from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS where type <> 'PRINT'

Property.name: SelectAllDobavljac
Property.value: select ID_ORGANIZATION, TYPE, NAME1, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, TEL, FAX, EMAIL, D_INSERT, ID_SUBJECT, ID_ORG_SUPERIOR from SM.SM_ORGANIZATIONS where type = 'PRINT'

Property.name: SelectAllFromOrder
Property.value: select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t6.name1, t1.id_status, id_dobavljac, t7.name1, t3.price from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_organization) left join sm.sm_organizations t7 on (t1.id_dobavljac = t7.id_organization) where t1.id_gn_item_order=? order by t2.id_order desc

Property.name: SelectCertificates
Property.value: select t1.ID, t1.TEXT as naziv, t1.code, t1.sm_states_id, t2.code, t2.TEXT, t1.id_measure, t3.name, t1.status, t1.id_type, t4.naziv, t1.d_change, t1.valid_from, t1.valid_to, t1.notes, t1.document_name, t1.serial_no, t1.serija, t1.price from vis_ex.cert_certificates t1 left join sm.sm_states t2 on (t1.sm_states_id = t2.id) left join vis_ex.cert_measure t3 on (t1.id_measure = t3.id_measure) left join vis_ex.cert_type t4 on (t1.id_type = t4.id_type)

Property.name: SelectCertificatesLanguages
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t3.id as id_certificate, (select listagg(t2.name,', ') within group (order by t1.id) from vis_ex.cert_cert_lang t1 left join sm.sm_languages t2 on (t1.id_language = t2.id_language) where t1.id_certificate = t3.id and t1.activity = 1) as jezici, t3.TEXT as naziv_cert, t3.code, null as sm_states_id, null as drzava_code, (select listagg(t4.text,', ') within group (order by t4.id) from vis_ex.cert_states tcs left join sm.sm_states t4 on (tcs.id_state = t4.id) where tcs.id_certificate = t3.id and tcs.activity = 1) as drzava, t3.id_measure, t5.name as mjera, t3.status, t3.id_type, t6.naziv as tip, t3.d_change, t3.valid_from, t3.valid_to, t3.notes, t3.document_name, t3.serial_no, t3.serija, t3.price from vis_ex.cert_certificates t3 left join vis_ex.cert_measure t5 on (t3.id_measure = t5.id_measure) left join vis_ex.cert_type t6 on (t3.id_type = t6.id_type) where t3.activity = 1 group by t3.id, t3.TEXT, t3.code, t3.id_measure, t5.name, t3.status, t3.id_type, t6.naziv, t3.d_change, t3.valid_from, t3.valid_to, t3.notes, t3.document_name, t3.serial_no, t3.serija, t3.price order by t3.id, t3.code ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountCertificatesLanguages
Property.value: select count(*) from vis_ex.cert_certificates t1 where t1.activity = 1

Property.name: SearchCertificatesLanguages
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.id_certificate, listagg(t2.name,', ') within group (order by t1.id) as jezici, t3.TEXT as naziv_cert, t3.code, t3.sm_states_id, t4.code as drzava_code, t4.TEXT as drzava, t3.id_measure, t5.name as mjera, t3.status, t3.id_type, t6.naziv as tip, t3.d_change, t3.valid_from, t3.valid_to, t3.notes, t3.document_name, t3.serial_no, t3.serija, t3.price from vis_ex.cert_certificates t3 left join vis_ex.cert_cert_lang t1 on (t1.id_certificate = t3.id) left join sm.sm_languages t2 on (t1.id_language = t2.id_language) left join sm.sm_states t4 on (t3.sm_states_id = t4.id) left join vis_ex.cert_measure t5 on (t3.id_measure = t5.id_measure) left join vis_ex.cert_type t6 on (t3.id_type = t6.id_type) where t1.activity = 1 and t3.activity = 1 and t3.code like ? and t3.text like ? and t3.sm_states_id like nvl(?, '%') and (t3.valid_from >= nvl(to_date(?,'dd.MM.yyyy'),to_date('01.01.2000','dd.MM.yyyy')) or t3.valid_from is null) and (t3.valid_to <= nvl(to_date(?,'dd.MM.yyyy'), sysdate) or t3.valid_to is null) group by t1.id_certificate, t3.TEXT, t3.code, t3.sm_states_id, t4.code, t4.TEXT, t3.id_measure, t5.name, t3.status, t3.id_type, t6.naziv, t3.d_change, t3.valid_from, t3.valid_to, t3.notes, t3.document_name, t3.serial_no, t3.serija, t3.price order by t1.id_certificate, t3.code ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountSearchCertificatesLanguages
Property.value: select count(*) from vis_ex.cert_certificates t3 where t3.activity = 1 and t3.code like ? and t3.text like ? and t3.sm_states_id like nvl(?, '%') and (t3.valid_from >= nvl(to_date(?,'dd.MM.yyyy'),to_date('01.01.2000','dd.MM.yyyy')) or t3.valid_from is null) and (t3.valid_to <= nvl(to_date(?,'dd.MM.yyyy'), sysdate) or t3.valid_to is null)

Property.name: SelectLanguages
Property.value: select id_language, name from sm.sm_languages where id_language > 0 order by 2 asc

Property.name: GetCertifikatJezici
Property.value: select t1.id_language, t2.name from vis_ex.cert_cert_lang t1 left join sm.sm_languages t2 on (t1.id_language = t2.id_language) where t1.id_certificate = ?

Property.name: GetCertifikatDrzave

Property.name: SelectPrintedCertificatesLanguages
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.ID_DOCUMENT, t1.id_certificate, t2.code, t2.text, (select listagg(t6.name,', ') within group (order by t0.id) from vis_ex.cert_cert_lang t0 left join sm.sm_languages t6 on (t0.id_language = t6.id_language) where t0.id_certificate = t2.id and t0.activity = 1) as jezici, t3.id_measure, t3.name, null as id, (select listagg(t4.text,', ') within group (order by t4.id) from vis_ex.cert_states tcs left join sm.sm_states t4 on (tcs.id_state = t4.id) where tcs.id_certificate = t2.id and tcs.activity = 1) as text2, t1.serial_no, t2.price, t1.d_issue, t5.id_organization, t5.name1, t2.serija from vis_ex.cert_documents t1 left join vis_ex.cert_certificates t2 on (t2.id = t1.id_certificate) left join vis_ex.cert_measure t3 on (t2.id_measure = t3.id_measure) left join sm.sm_organizations t5 on (t1.id_regional_office = t5.id_organization) where t1.status = '1' and t1.activity = 1 order by t1.ID_DOCUMENT desc, t1.id_certificate, t2.code ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountPrintedCertificatesLanguages

Property.name: SelectPrintedCertificatesLanguagesOrg

Property.name: SelectPrintedCertificatesLanguagesStornoOrg
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.ID_DOCUMENT, t1.id_certificate, t2.code, t2.text, (select listagg(t6.name,', ') within group (order by t0.id) from vis_ex.cert_cert_lang t0 left join sm.sm_languages t6 on (t0.id_language = t6.id_language) where t0.id_certificate = t2.id and t0.activity = 1) as jezici, t3.id_measure, t3.name, null as id, (select listagg(t4.text,', ') within group (order by t4.id) from vis_ex.cert_states tcs left join sm.sm_states t4 on (tcs.id_state = t4.id) where tcs.id_certificate = t2.id and tcs.activity = 1) as text2, t1.serial_no, t2.price, t1.datum_opoziva, t5.id_organization, t5.name1, t2.serija from vis_ex.cert_documents t1 left join vis_ex.cert_certificates t2 on (t2.id = t1.id_certificate) left join vis_ex.cert_measure t3 on (t2.id_measure = t3.id_measure) left join sm.sm_organizations t5 on (t1.id_regional_office = t5.id_organization) where t1.status = '0' and t1.activity = 0 and t1.id_regional_office = ? order by t1.ID_DOCUMENT desc, t1.id_certificate, t2.code ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: SelectRacunStatus
Property.value: select * from vis_ex.sif_racun_status

Property.name: ObracunCert
Property.value: select id_document, t3.id as id_certificate, t3.code as cert_code, t3.price, t2.id_subject, t2.name as sub_name, t2.vat_no, t4.street, t4.hn, t5.code, t5.name, t3.text as cert_name, nvl(t7.sif_kupca, 0) as sif_kupca from vis_ex.cert_documents t1 left join sm.sm_subjects t2 on (t1.id_subject = t2.id_subject) left join vis_ex.cert_certificates t3 on (t1.id_certificate = t3.id) left join loc.loc_addresses t4 on (t2.id_address = t4.id_address) left join loc.loc_zip_codes t5 on (t4.id_zip_code = t5.id_zip_code) left join loc.loc_villages t6 on (t4.id_village = t6.id_village) left join vis_ex.sif_kupca t7 on (t1.id_subject = t7.id_subject) where t1.activity = 1 and t1.d_issue between nvl(?,TO_DATE('01.01.2012','dd.MM.yyyy')) and nvl(?,sysdate) and t1.d_update is not null and t1.id_updater is not null and t1.odobrena_km is not null and t1.id_cert_racun is null order by t2.id_subject, t3.id

Property.name: SelectEstablishments
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.id_establishment, t2.name, t1.approval_num, t2.id_subject, t3.short_name, t3.vat_no as sub_oib, concat(t4.street, concat(' ', t4.hn)) as sub_street, concat(t5.code, concat(' ', t5.name)) as sub_zip from vis.est_establishments t1 left join vis.est_documents t2 on (t1.id_document = t2.id_document) left join sm.sm_subjects t3 on (t2.id_subject = t3.id_subject) left join loc.loc_addresses t4 on (t3.id_address = t4.id_address) left join loc.loc_zip_codes t5 on (t4.id_zip_code = t5.id_zip_code) where t1.activity = 1 and t2.activity = 1 ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountEstablishments
Property.value: select count(*) from vis.est_establishments t1 left join vis.est_documents t2 on (t1.id_document = t2.id_document) where t1.activity = 1 and t2.activity = 1

Property.name: SearchEstablishments
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.id_establishment, t2.name, t1.approval_num, t2.id_subject, t3.short_name, t3.vat_no as sub_oib, concat(t4.street, concat(' ', t4.hn)) as sub_street, concat(t5.code, concat(' ', t5.name)) as sub_zip from vis.est_establishments t1 left join vis.est_documents t2 on (t1.id_document = t2.id_document) left join sm.sm_subjects t3 on (t2.id_subject = t3.id_subject) left join loc.loc_addresses t4 on (t3.id_address = t4.id_address) left join loc.loc_zip_codes t5 on (t4.id_zip_code = t5.id_zip_code) where t1.activity = 1 and t2.activity = 1 and t2.name like ? and t1.approval_num like ? and t3.short_name like ? and t3.vat_no like ? order by 3, 2, 5, 6 ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountSearchEstablishments
Property.value: select count(*) from ( select t1.id_establishment, t2.name, t1.approval_num, t2.id_subject, t3.short_name, t3.vat_no as sub_oib, concat(t4.street, concat(' ', t4.hn)) as sub_street, concat(t5.code, concat(' ', t5.name)) as sub_zip from vis.est_establishments t1 left join vis.est_documents t2 on (t1.id_document = t2.id_document) left join sm.sm_subjects t3 on (t2.id_subject = t3.id_subject) left join loc.loc_addresses t4 on (t3.id_address = t4.id_address) left join loc.loc_zip_codes t5 on (t4.id_zip_code = t5.id_zip_code) where t1.activity = 1 and t2.activity = 1 and t2.name like ? and t1.approval_num like ? and t3.short_name like ? and t3.vat_no like ? )

Property.name: SelectEstablishmentsExt
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.id_establishment, t2.name, t1.approval_num, t2.id_subject, t3.short_name, t3.vat_no as sub_oib, concat(t4.street, concat(' ', t4.hn)) as obj_street, concat(t5.code, concat(' ', t5.name)) as obj_zip, t2.phone_no, t2.fax, t2.email from vis.est_establishments t1 left join vis.est_documents t2 on (t1.id_document = t2.id_document) left join sm.sm_subjects t3 on (t2.id_subject = t3.id_subject) left join loc.loc_addresses t4 on (t2.id_address = t4.id_address) left join loc.loc_zip_codes t5 on (t4.id_zip_code = t5.id_zip_code) where t1.activity = 1 and t2.activity = 1 order by 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountEstablishmentsExt
Property.value: select count(*) from vis.est_establishments t1 left join vis.est_documents t2 on (t1.id_document = t2.id_document) where t1.activity = 1 and t2.activity = 1

Property.name: SearchEstablishmentsExt
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t1.id_establishment, t2.name, t1.approval_num, t2.id_subject, t3.short_name, t3.vat_no as sub_oib, concat(t4.street, concat(' ', t4.hn)) as obj_street, concat(t5.code, concat(' ', t5.name)) as obj_zip, t2.phone_no, t2.fax, t2.email from vis.est_establishments t1 left join vis.est_documents t2 on (t1.id_document = t2.id_document) left join sm.sm_subjects t3 on (t2.id_subject = t3.id_subject) left join loc.loc_addresses t4 on (t2.id_address = t4.id_address) left join loc.loc_zip_codes t5 on (t4.id_zip_code = t5.id_zip_code) where t1.activity = 1 and t2.activity = 1 and upper(t2.name) like ? and upper(t4.address_short) like ? order by 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountSearchEstablishmentsExt
Property.value: select count(*) from vis.est_establishments t1 left join vis.est_documents t2 on (t1.id_document = t2.id_document) left join sm.sm_subjects t3 on (t2.id_subject = t3.id_subject) left join loc.loc_addresses t4 on (t2.id_address = t4.id_address) left join loc.loc_zip_codes t5 on (t4.id_zip_code = t5.id_zip_code) where t1.activity = 1 and t2.activity = 1 and upper(t2.name) like ? and upper(t4.address_short) like ?

Property.name: SelectHoldings
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t2.posjednik_id, t1.jibg, t2.ime, t2.prezime, t2.oib, t2.naziv, t3.adresa_id, t5.naziv as ulica, t3.kbr, t4.naziv as mjesto, t4.pbr from hpa.farma t1 left join hpa.posjednik t2 on (t1.farma_id = t2.farma_id) left join hpa.adresa t3 on (t2.adresa_id = t3.adresa_id) left join hpa.naselje t4 on (t3.naselje_id = t4.naselje_id) left join hpa.ulica t5 on (t3.ulica_id = t5.ulica_id and t3.naselje_id = t5.naselje_id) ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountHoldings
Property.value: select count(*) from hpa.farma t1 left join hpa.posjednik t2 on (t1.farma_id = t2.farma_id)

Property.name: SearchHoldings
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t2.posjednik_id, t1.jibg, t2.ime, t2.prezime, t2.oib, t2.naziv, t3.adresa_id, t5.naziv as ulica, t3.kbr, t4.naziv as mjesto, t4.pbr from hpa.farma t1 left join hpa.posjednik t2 on (t1.farma_id = t2.farma_id) left join hpa.adresa t3 on (t2.adresa_id = t3.adresa_id) left join hpa.naselje t4 on (t3.naselje_id = t4.naselje_id) left join hpa.ulica t5 on (t3.ulica_id = t5.ulica_id and t3.naselje_id = t5.naselje_id) where t2.ime like ? and t2.prezime like ? and t2.naziv like ? and t1.jibg like ? and t2.oib like ? ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountSearchHoldings
Property.value: select count(*) from hpa.farma t1 left join hpa.posjednik t2 on (t1.farma_id = t2.farma_id) where t2.ime like ? and t2.prezime like ? and t2.naziv like ? and t1.jibg like ? and t2.oib like ?

Property.name: GetHoldingData
Property.value: select t1.jibg, t2.ime, t2.prezime, t2.oib, t2.naziv, t3.adresa_id, t5.naziv, t3.kbr, t4.naziv, t4.pbr from hpa.farma t1 left join hpa.posjednik t2 on (t1.farma_id = t2.farma_id) left join hpa.adresa t3 on (t2.adresa_id = t3.adresa_id) left join hpa.naselje t4 on (t3.naselje_id = t4.naselje_id) left join hpa.ulica t5 on (t3.ulica_id = t5.ulica_id and t3.naselje_id = t5.naselje_id) where jibg = ?

Property.name: GetIzdani4Report
Property.value: select rownum, a.* from ( select t1.d_issue, t2.code,t1.serial_no, t3.naziv as tip, t1.odobrena_km, t4.name as ovlastena_osoba, jibg as broj, nvl(t5.naziv, concat(t5.ime, concat(' ', t5.prezime))) as subjekt from vis_ex.cert_documents t1 left join vis_ex.cert_certificates t2 on (t1.id_certificate = t2.id) left join vis_ex.cert_type t3 on (t2.id_type = t3.id_type) left join sm.sm_users t4 on (t1.izdao = t4.id_user) left join hpa.posjednik t5 on (t1.id_subject = t5.posjednik_id) where to_char(t1.d_issue,'MM.yyyy') = to_char(sysdate,'MM.yyyy') and t1.loc_type = 1 and izdao like nvl (?, '%') union all select t1.d_issue, t2.code,t1.serial_no, t3.naziv as tip, t1.odobrena_km, t4.name as ovlastena_osoba, vkb as broj, t5.short_name as subjekt from vis_ex.cert_documents t1 left join vis_ex.cert_certificates t2 on (t1.id_certificate = t2.id) left join vis_ex.cert_type t3 on (t2.id_type = t3.id_type) left join sm.sm_users t4 on (t1.izdao = t4.id_user) left join sm.sm_subjects t5 on (t1.id_subject = t5.id_subject) where to_char(t1.d_issue,'MM.yyyy') = to_char(sysdate,'MM.yyyy') and t1.loc_type = 2 and izdao like nvl (?, '%') ) a order by 1, a.d_issue desc

Property.name: GetOrgCertificates
Property.value: select id_cert_org, id_certificate, id_organization from vis_ex.cert_org where id_organization = ?

Property.name: InsertOrgCertificate
Property.value: insert into vis_ex.cert_org (id_cert_org, id_certificate, id_organization) values (vis_ex.cert_org_seq.nextval,?,?)

Property.name: DeleteOrgCertificate
Property.value: delete from vis_ex.cert_org where id_certificate = ? and id_organization = ?

Property.name: SelectCertificatesFilter
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t3.id as id_certificate, (select listagg(t2.name,', ') within group (order by t1.id) from vis_ex.cert_cert_lang t1 left join sm.sm_languages t2 on (t1.id_language = t2.id_language) where t1.id_certificate = t3.id and t1.activity = 1) as jezici, t3.TEXT as naziv_cert, t3.code, null as sm_states_id, null as drzava_code, (select listagg(t4.text,', ') within group (order by t4.id) from vis_ex.cert_states tcs left join sm.sm_states t4 on (tcs.id_state = t4.id) where tcs.id_certificate = t3.id and tcs.activity = 1) as drzava, t3.id_measure, t5.name as mjera, t3.status, t3.id_type, t6.naziv as tip, t3.d_change, t3.valid_from, t3.valid_to, t3.notes, t3.document_name, t3.serial_no, t3.serija, t3.price from vis_ex.cert_certificates t3 left join vis_ex.cert_measure t5 on (t3.id_measure = t5.id_measure) left join vis_ex.cert_type t6 on (t3.id_type = t6.id_type) where t3.activity = 1 and t3.id in (select id_certificate from vis_ex.cert_org where id_organization = ?) order by t3.id, t3.code ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountCertificatesFilter
Property.value: select count(*) from vis_ex.cert_certificates t1 where t1.activity = 1 and t1.id in (select id_certificate from vis_ex.cert_org where id_organization = ?)

Property.name: SelectCertificatesFilter2
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select t3.id as id_certificate, (select listagg(t2.name,', ') within group (order by t1.id) from vis_ex.cert_cert_lang t1 left join sm.sm_languages t2 on (t1.id_language = t2.id_language) where t1.id_certificate = t3.id and t1.activity = 1) as jezici, t3.TEXT as naziv_cert, t3.code, null as sm_states_id, null as drzava_code, (select listagg(t4.text,', ') within group (order by t4.id) from vis_ex.cert_states tcs left join sm.sm_states t4 on (tcs.id_state = t4.id) where tcs.id_certificate = t3.id and tcs.activity = 1) as drzava, t3.id_measure, t5.name as mjera, t3.status, t3.id_type, t6.naziv as tip, t3.d_change, t3.valid_from, t3.valid_to, t3.notes, t3.document_name, t3.serial_no, t3.serija, t3.price from vis_ex.cert_certificates t3 left join vis_ex.cert_measure t5 on (t3.id_measure = t5.id_measure) left join vis_ex.cert_type t6 on (t3.id_type = t6.id_type) where t3.activity = 1 and t3.id not in (select id_certificate from vis_ex.cert_org where id_organization = ?) order by t3.id, t3.code ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountCertificatesFilter2
Property.value: select count(*) from vis_ex.cert_certificates t1 where t1.activity = 1 and t1.id not in (select id_certificate from vis_ex.cert_org where id_organization = ?)

Property.name: ReportCertifikati
Property.value: select t3.id as id_certificate, (select listagg(t2.name,', ') within group (order by t1.id) from vis_ex.cert_cert_lang t1 left join sm.sm_languages t2 on (t1.id_language = t2.id_language) where t1.id_certificate = t3.id and t1.activity = 1) as jezici, t3.TEXT as naziv_cert, t3.code, null sm_states_id, null as drzava_code, (select listagg(t4.text,', ') within group (order by t4.id) from vis_ex.cert_states tcs left join sm.sm_states t4 on (tcs.id_state = t4.id) where tcs.id_certificate = t3.id and tcs.activity = 1) as drzava, t3.id_measure, t5.name as mjera, t3.status, t3.id_type, t6.naziv as tip, t3.d_change, t3.valid_from, t3.valid_to, t3.notes, t3.document_name, t3.serial_no, t3.serija, t3.price from vis_ex.cert_certificates t3 left join vis_ex.cert_measure t5 on (t3.id_measure = t5.id_measure) left join vis_ex.cert_type t6 on (t3.id_type = t6.id_type) where t3.activity = 1 group by t3.id, t3.TEXT, t3.code, t3.sm_states_id, t3.id_measure, t5.name, t3.status, t3.id_type, t6.naziv, t3.d_change, t3.valid_from, t3.valid_to, t3.notes, t3.document_name, t3.serial_no, t3.serija, t3.price order by t3.id, t3.code

Property.name: ReportIzdaniCertifikati
Property.value: select rownum as rbr, a.* from ( select t1.ID_DOCUMENT, t1.id_certificate, t2.code, t2.text, (select listagg(t6.name,', ') within group (order by t0.id) from vis_ex.cert_cert_lang t0 left join sm.sm_languages t6 on (t0.id_language = t6.id_language) where t0.id_certificate = t2.id and t0.activity = 1) as jezici, t3.id_measure, t3.name, null as id, (select listagg(t4.text,', ') within group (order by t4.id) from vis_ex.cert_states tcs left join sm.sm_states t4 on (tcs.id_state = t4.id) where tcs.id_certificate = t2.id and tcs.activity = 1) as text2, t1.serial_no, t2.price, t1.d_issue, t5.id_organization, t5.name1, t2.serija from vis_ex.cert_documents t1 left join vis_ex.cert_certificates t2 on (t2.id = t1.id_certificate) left join vis_ex.cert_measure t3 on (t2.id_measure = t3.id_measure) left join sm.sm_organizations t5 on (t1.id_regional_office = t5.id_organization) where t1.status = '1' and t1.activity = 1 and rownum < 65000 and t5.id_organization like nvl(?,'%') order by t1.ID_DOCUMENT desc ) a

Property.name: ReportStorniraniCertifikati
Property.value: select rownum as rbr, a.* from ( select t1.ID_DOCUMENT, t1.id_certificate, t2.code, t2.text, (select listagg(t6.name,', ') within group (order by t0.id) from vis_ex.cert_cert_lang t0 left join sm.sm_languages t6 on (t0.id_language = t6.id_language) where t0.id_certificate = t2.id and t0.activity = 1) as jezici, t3.id_measure, t3.name, null as id, (select listagg(t4.text,', ') within group (order by t4.id) from vis_ex.cert_states tcs left join sm.sm_states t4 on (tcs.id_state = t4.id) where tcs.id_certificate = t2.id and tcs.activity = 1) as text2, t1.serial_no, t2.price, t1.d_issue, t5.id_organization, t5.name1, t2.serija from vis_ex.cert_documents t1 left join vis_ex.cert_certificates t2 on (t2.id = t1.id_certificate) left join vis_ex.cert_measure t3 on (t2.id_measure = t3.id_measure) left join sm.sm_organizations t5 on (t1.id_regional_office = t5.id_organization) where t1.status = '0' and t1.activity = 0 and rownum < 65000 and t5.id_organization like nvl(?,'%') order by t1.ID_DOCUMENT desc ) a

Property.name: ReportNarudzbe
Property.value: select rownum as rbr, a.* from ( select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv as status, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t6.name1, t1.id_status as id_status2, id_dobavljac, t7.name1 as naziv_org, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_organization) left join sm.sm_organizations t7 on (t1.id_dobavljac = t7.id_organization) where t2.d_order between ? and ? and t2.id_narucitelj like nvl (?, '%') and id_dobavljac like nvl (?, '%') order by t2.id_order desc ) a

Property.name: ReportNarudzbeExtra
Property.value: select rownum as rbr, a.* from ( select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv as status, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t10.name1, t10.address1 || ' ' || t10.address2 || ', Tel.: ' || nvl(t8.phone_no,'') || ', Fax.: ' || nvl(t8.fax,'') || ', Email.: ' || nvl(t8.email,'') as kontakt, t1.id_status as id_status2, id_dobavljac, t7.name1 as naziv_org, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join sm.sm_users t6 on (t2.narucio= t6.id_user) left join sm.sm_organizations t7 on (t1.id_dobavljac = t7.id_organization) left join sm.sm_subjects t8 on (t6.id_subject = t8.id_subject) left join loc.loc_addresses t9 on (t8.id_address = t9.id_address) left join sm.sm_organizations t10 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t10.id_organization) where t2.d_order between ? and ? and t2.id_narucitelj like nvl (?, '%') and id_dobavljac like nvl (?, '%') and t2.narucio like nvl (?, '%') and t1.id_gn_org_docs like nvl (?, '%') and t2.id_order like nvl(?, '%') and t1.id_status in (?,?,?,?,?,?,?) order by t2.id_order desc, t1.id_gn_item_orders_type ) a

Property.name: ReportNarudzbeTiskara
Property.value: select rownum as rbr, a.* from ( select t1.id_gn_item_orders_type, t2.d_order, t1.id_gn_item_order, t1.id_gn_org_docs, t3.name, t3.notes, t1.kolicina, t1.iznos, t1.id_status, t4.naziv as status, t2.id_narucitelj, t5.id, t5.naziv, t6.name1, t1.serijski_broj_od, t1.serijski_broj_do, t3.price from vis_ex.gn_item_orders_type t1 left join vis_ex.gn_item_orders t2 on (t1.id_gn_item_order = t2.id_order) left join vis_ex.gn_docs t3 on (t1.id_gn_org_docs = t3.id_gn_org_docs) left join vis_ex.gn_item_order_status t4 on (t1.id_status = t4.id) left join vis_ex.gn_measure_unit t5 on (t3.id_measure_unit = t5.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t6 on (t2.id_narucitelj = t6.id_organization) where t1.id_status = 1 and id_dobavljac=? and t2.d_order between ? and ? order by t2.id_order desc ) a

Property.name: GetApproveCertificateData
Property.value: select t1.serial_no, concat(t2.code, concat(' - ', t2.text)) as cert, t3.name1, t4.name, t1.d_issue, t1.km, nvl(t1.odobrena_km,-1) as odobrena_km, t5.short_name as subjekt, t5.vat_no as oib, t1.loc_type, t1.vkb as broj, t6.street as ulica, t6.hn as kbr, to_number(t7.code) as pbr, t7.name as naselje from vis_ex.cert_documents t1 left join vis_ex.cert_certificates t2 on (t1.id_certificate = t2.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t3 on (t1.id_regional_office = t3.id_organization) left join sm.sm_users t4 on (t1.id_vet_inspector = t4.id_user) left join sm.sm_subjects t5 on (t1.id_subject = t5.id_subject) left join loc.loc_addresses t6 on (t5.id_address = t6.id_address) left join loc.loc_zip_codes t7 on (t6.id_zip_code = t7.id_zip_code) where t1.activity = 1 and t1.loc_type = 2 and t1.id_document = ? union all select t1.serial_no, concat(t2.code, concat(' - ', t2.text)) as cert, t3.name1, t4.name, t1.d_issue, t1.km, nvl(t1.odobrena_km,-1) as odobrena_km, nvl(t5.naziv, concat(t5.ime, concat(' ', t5.prezime))) as subjekt, t5.oib as oib, t1.loc_type, t1.jibg as broj, t8.naziv as ulica, t6.kbr, t6.pbr, t7.naziv as naselje from vis_ex.cert_documents t1 left join vis_ex.cert_certificates t2 on (t1.id_certificate = t2.id) left join sm.sm_organizations t3 on (t1.id_regional_office = t3.id_organization) left join sm.sm_users t4 on (t1.id_vet_inspector = t4.id_user) left join hpa.posjednik t5 on (t1.id_subject = t5.posjednik_id) left join hpa.adresa t6 on (t5.adresa_id = t6.adresa_id) left join hpa.naselje t7 on (t6.naselje_id = t7.naselje_id) left join hpa.ulica t8 on (t6.ulica_id = t8.ulica_id and t6.naselje_id = t8.naselje_id) where t1.activity = 1 and t1.loc_type = 1 and t1.id_document = ?

Property.name: GetApproveCertificateProductsData
Property.value: select t2.id, t2.code, t2.text, t2.id_measure_unit, t3.opis, t1.quantity from vis_ex.cert_doc_prod t1 left join vis_ex.cert_products t2 on (t1.id_product = t2.id) left join vis_ex.measure_unit t3 on (t2.id_measure_unit = t3.id_measure_unit) where id_document = ?

Property.name: ApproveCertPrinted
Property.value: update vis_ex.cert_documents set d_update = sysdate, odobrena_km = ?, id_updater = ? where id_document = ?

Property.name: UpdateRacunCert
Property.value: update vis_ex.cert_racun set datum_placanja = ?, uplaceni_iznos = ?, ira = ?, id_status_placanja = ? where id_racun = ?

Property.name: SelectBarcodeContingent
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select rownum, t1.id_contingent, 1 as barcodeTypeCode, 'Naljepnice' as barcodeType, t1.d_insert, t1.tubes_no, (select min(id_tube_bc) from vis_ex.tubes where id_contingent = t1.id_contingent) as barcodeFrom, (select max(id_tube_bc) from vis_ex.tubes where id_contingent = t1.id_contingent) as barcodeTo, (select count(*) from vis_ex.tubes where id_contingent = t1.id_contingent and status = 1 and id_organization is null and activity = 1) as available from vis_ex.tube_contingents t1 where t1.activity = 1 order by t1.id_contingent desc ) a where rownum < ? ) WHERE r__ >= ?

Property.name: CountBarcodeContingent
Property.value: select count(*) from vis_ex.tube_contingents t1 where t1.activity = 1

Property.name: SelectBarcodes
Property.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum r__ FROM ( select id_tube, id_tube_bc, status from vis_ex.tubes t1 where t1.activity = 1 and t1.id_contingent = ? order by id_tube ) a where rownum <= ? ) WHERE r__ > ?

Property.name: CountBarcodes
Property.value: select count(*) from vis_ex.tubes t1 where t1.activity = 1 and id_contingent = ?

Property.name: RemoveAllCertOrg
Property.value: DELETE FROM vis_ex.cert_org WHERE ID_ORGANIZATION = ?

Property.name: RemoveAllDocOrg
Property.value: DELETE FROM vis_ex.gn_docs_org WHERE ID_ORGANIZATION = ?

Property.name: UpdateTubeStatus
Property.value: update vis_ex.tubes set status = 4 where id_order = ? and id_organization = ?

Property.name: InsertReuseSerialNumbers
Property.value: insert into vis_ex.gn_docs_reuse_serial(id_gn_docs_reuse_serial, id_gn_org_docs, id_gn_item_orders_type,serijski_broj_od,serijski_broj_do,kolicina, date_created, date_modified, modified_by, created_by, activity) values (VIS_EX.GN_DOCS_REUSE_SEQ.nextval,?,?,?,?,null, sysdate, sysdate, ?, ?, 1)

Property.name: BarcodeReuseSerialNumbers
Property.value: update vis_ex.tubes set id_order = null, id_organization = null, status = 1, d_update = null, id_updater = null where id_tube_bc between ? and ? and id_order = ?
